item.description:
Join my ski club as we celebrate columbus day weekend. There will be 4 activities to choose from:

Saturday
Mountain Biking at Attitash. Lift tickets are just $25 and including the alpine slide and mountain coaster attractions. The also have xc trails available and mountain bike rentals.
Kayak of Conway Lake bring your own or rent from northern extremes.

Sunday:
A hike in the White Mountains (location to be determined) Hike will be about 3-6 miles.
Mountain bike through Whitaker Woods or Great Glen Trails.

Guest fees to stay at the Makusue ski club are just $25 per night. You are welcome to come up friday night or saturday morning.

This weekend event is also posted on the makusue ski club page and chaos meetup, plus our club members there should be a good turnout and lots of friendly people.

Stay tuned for more details.
item.name: Maktoberfest Mountain Biking/Kayaking Event
